splashscreen.title: Forest Loss
splashscreen.subtitle: Amazon Basin, Brazil
splashscreen.altText: Forest Loss in Amazon Basin, Brazil

slides.text: Rainforests worldwide are being destroyed at an alarming rate. The conversion of tropical rainforests to pastures and croplands is causing a dramatic effect on the landscape, biodiversity and environment.
This is of great concern as rainforests play an important role in our global climate. It is estimated that 20% of the Amazon biome has already been lost and the trend will worsen if gone unchecked.
